report.title: Regional Coordinator grid 2 - Download Version
report.description: Display data for regional coordinators to download. Similar to My Records downloads apart from not limited to one user's data and limited to one country.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM samples s LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id = s.location_id AND l.deleted = false JOIN indicia.cache_samples_functional csf on csf.id = s.id JOIN indicia.cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = cof.id
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_start_time on sav_start_time.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_start_time.sample_attribute_id = #start_time_attr_id# AND sav_start_time.deleted = false
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_hab on sav_hab.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_hab.sample_attribute_id = #habitat_smp_id# AND sav_hab.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_hab on ctt_hab.id = sav_hab.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_hab_lang on ctt_hab_lang.meaning_id = ctt_hab.meaning_id AND ctt_hab_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_other_hab on sav_other_hab.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_other_hab.sample_attribute_id = #other_habitat_smp_id# AND sav_other_hab.deleted = false
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_target on sav_target.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_target.sample_attribute_id = #target_smp_id# AND sav_target.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_target on ctt_target.id = sav_target.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_target_lang on ctt_target_lang.meaning_id = ctt_target.meaning_id AND ctt_target_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_other_target on sav_other_target.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_other_target.sample_attribute_id = #other_target_smp_id# AND sav_other_target.deleted = false
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cover on sav_cover.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_cover.sample_attribute_id = #cover_within_patch_attr_id# AND sav_cover.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cover on ctt_cover.id = sav_cover.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cover_lang on ctt_cover_lang.meaning_id = ctt_cover.meaning_id AND ctt_cover_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_flowers_counted on sav_flowers_counted.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_flowers_counted.sample_attribute_id = #flowers_counted_attr_id# AND sav_flowers_counted.deleted = false
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_flowers_unit on sav_flowers_unit.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_flowers_unit.sample_attribute_id = #flower_unit_attr_id# AND sav_flowers_unit.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_unit on ctt_flowers_unit.id = sav_flowers_unit.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_flowers_unit_lang on ctt_flowers_unit_lang.meaning_id = ctt_flowers_unit.meaning_id AND ctt_flowers_unit_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_patch_context on sav_patch_context.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_patch_context.sample_attribute_id = #patch_context_attr_id# AND sav_patch_context.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_context on ctt_patch_context.id = sav_patch_context.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_context_lang on ctt_patch_context_lang.meaning_id = ctt_patch_context.meaning_id AND ctt_patch_context_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cloud_cover on sav_cloud_cover.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_cloud_cover.sample_attribute_id = #cloud_cover_attr_id# AND sav_cloud_cover.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cloud_cover on ctt_cloud_cover.id = sav_cloud_cover.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_cloud_cover_lang on ctt_cloud_cover_lang.meaning_id = ctt_cloud_cover.meaning_id AND ctt_cloud_cover_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_wind on sav_wind.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_wind.sample_attribute_id = #wind_attr_id# AND sav_wind.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_wind on ctt_wind.id = sav_wind.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_wind_lang on ctt_wind_lang.meaning_id = ctt_wind.meaning_id AND ctt_wind_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_patch_sunshine on sav_patch_sunshine.sample_id = csnf.id AND sav_patch_sunshine.sample_attribute_id = #patch_sunshine_attr_id# AND sav_patch_sunshine.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_sunshine on ctt_patch_sunshine.id = sav_patch_sunshine.int_value LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_patch_sunshine_lang on ctt_patch_sunshine_lang.meaning_id = ctt_patch_sunshine.meaning_id AND ctt_patch_sunshine_lang.language_iso = '#language#'
LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.occurrence_id = cof.id AND occurrence_attribute_id = #insect_abund_occ_id# AND oav.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR s.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#filtered_survey_id#' OR '#filtered_survey_id#'='') AND (array[#intersect_location_ids#] && csf.location_ids = true)

column.name: survey_title
column.sql: case s.survey_id when #public_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count' when #1km_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count 1km' when #fit_count_app_survey_id# then 'FIT Count App' else '' END

column.name: output_sref
column.sql: get_output_sref( greatest( round(sqrt(st_area(st_transform(s.geom, sref_system_to_srid(s.entered_sref_system)))))::integer, null, 1000, 1000, 10 ), reduce_precision(coalesce(s.geom, l.centroid_geom), false, greatest(null, 1000)) )

column.name: target
column.sql: CASE WHEN sav_target.int_value = #other_target_tt_id# THEN 'Other' || ' (' || sav_other_target.text_value || ')' ELSE ctt_target_lang.term END

column.name: target_photo
column.sql: CASE when '#image_path_prefix#' != '' THEN '#image_path_prefix#' || csnf.media ELSE csnf.media END

column.name: beetles
column.sql: sum(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #beetles_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: bumblebees
